sideeffects.sname: Infection, especially when white blood cell count is low

Remedies.rdescription: Symptomatic treatment for milder symptoms. Please consult your doctor immediately for further management. This information is only for education purposes and should not be construed as a medical advise. More medication and languages will be addedd in future. The goal is to provide easy accessible information to patients across the globe in their own languages. Additionally, patients will be able to record the severity and save time stamped data to monitor changes and review at time of clinic visit with the physician. Source: https://www.cancerresearchuk.org/about-cancer/treatment/drugs; https://ctep.cancer.gov/protocolDevelopment/sideeffects/drugs.htm
